Attempts to disable screen lock or modif.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for processes modifying registry keys related to screen saver timeout, system lock, or hibernate/sleep timeouts (e.g., using 'reg.exe'). Monitor Windows Event ID 4656/4657 for access attempts (read/write/delete) on power-related system files. Use anomaly detection to flag hosts with unusual changes in these settings.
